website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful and unique scalloped design provides plenty of shade for your patio table, hot tub, or backyard play area.
pros: Scalloped valance provides added sun protection
Sturdy umbrella with sleek, unobtrusive pole
cons: A few have complained that it doesn't hold up to heavy winds

customer_reviews.title: Adorable design, flimsy in even moderate wind
customer_reviews.text: Adorable design, too flimsy with even moderate wind. I purchased three of these. They look adorable from the window, but if even the slightest breeze comes through, it bends and then stands lopsided for the duration of its life. The regular 30-50lb bases you can buy Most places, tip right over when the wind blows. I had to spend another hundred dollars for the hundred pound bass at Lowe’s to provide a little more stability. Do you umbrella, just wish it was a little more heavy duty .
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and appear to be holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I love the "cabana" style of these umbrellas. It's a unique design that look like they belong in a resort, and I haven't found in local home stores. After about six weeks, they haven't faded or shown any deterioration during the hottest days of the summer. The metal structure is substantial and I haven't noticed any weak joints that look like they might fail. I did just purchase a third umbrella, along with covers to help maintain the deep blue color.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & Solid Shade Provider
customer_reviews.text: STURDY & BIG.......We bought two of these, crossing our fingers that they'd be sturdy enough and the fabric would be acceptable. In the past we always bought from Lowes or Home Depot and always bought those 9' umbrellas with that thicker, rougher feeling canvas. Well, these umbrellas have a smoother fabric, but they are high quality, not even remotely see-through, and they are very well made. They look better in person than in the pictures. We loved the two we bought so much that we bought a third one. Provides more than ample shade---BETTER than the big box store umbrellas!!
customer_reviews.author: SuzieMac

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Easy, Shades well  LOVE  it
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Great quality! Well made. Strong. BEAUTIFUL umbrella. Love the flaps, shades very well large area. Elegant looking. Extremely easy and no effort to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNA IMBESI

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best umbrella we've had for our patio. It's sturdy, easy to operate and is great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: trmpquilt

customer_reviews.title: Love the size covers all of my 6 person table
customer_reviews.text: Love the size covers all of my 6 person table. Opens easily,good quality. Color was great but was more of a taupe color. Did have a quarter size stain on the fabric but came off with soap and water. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made outdoor umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very well made umbrella - heavy fabric and sewing is sturdy. I gave it to my brother as a gift, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: elsa

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella. Sturdy. Easy to put up & down. Perfect size. Get multiple compliments. Can you wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so HAPPY to find these at a remarkable price her eon Amazon. The quality and look of this product is everything I was looking for an outdoor umbrella - no more canvas!! Just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Parlow

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and I am sure I'm going to love it. It's bigger than my old one. Looks so good on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella. I like the valance and it operates easily. Unfortunately we just bought this in February and already faded.
customer_reviews.author: Arden's Mother

customer_reviews.title: It's not really grey---
customer_reviews.text: It's an odd color, kind of a washed-out, grey/taupe with a plum undertone. I like the detail on the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice. Broke easily. No tie downs provided. First bit of wind snapped a support piece.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella, BUT due to the nylon like fabric and living in Florida, it’s super hot underneath it. I hate to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Avila

customer_reviews.title: Orange for days
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super vibrant and bold in color. Well made as well! Already people are asking where we got this!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Shea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and pretty umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and pretty umbrellas ! Strong and sturdy even in a strong wind. I would definitely invest in these.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: It says the color is grey but when I received it, the color is more of a Taupe color.
customer_reviews.author: Catann

product_meta.title: Safavieh PAT8000L Outdoor Collection UV Resistant Zimmerman 9' Crank Market Push Button Tilt Flap Umbrella, Navy/White
product_meta.description: Color:Navy/WhiteA classic market umbrella gets a chic makeover with fashion-forward navy fabric and a valance for extra sun protection and European flair. Its nine-foot polyester canopy and sturdy chrome aluminum frame make it the ideal umbrella for veranda or pool deck. Includes easy crank and tilt mechanism.
feature_bullets: This UV resistant umbrella adds contemporary flair to any veranda or pool deck
Features navy fabric and a valance for extra sun protection
Sturdy and sleek chrome aluminum frame
Safavieh has been a trusted brand in home furnishings for over 100 years, providing quality craftsmanship and unmatched style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
